name: Antonios Anastasopoulos
content: Antonios Anastasopoulos | George Mason NLP Search Antonios Anastasopoulos Assistant Professor George Mason University, ENGR 4412 Collaborating Senior Researcher, Archimedes AI Research Center Antonis Anastasopoulos is an assistant professor at George Mason Computer Science. He is also a Collaborating Senior Researcher at the Archimedes AI Research Center in Athens, Greece. He is interested in various aspects of multilingual Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning, with a main focus on Machine Translation and Speech Recognition for endangered languages and low-resource settings in general.
